item.title: Williams' OT magic caps Bears' latest comeback
item.description: Caleb Williams capped his NFL-leading sixth comeback win from a fourth-quarter deficit with a thrilling 46-yard TD pass to DJ Moore to stun the Packer...

item.title: 'Been There, Won That': Eagles clinch NFC East
item.description: The Eagles clinched their second straight NFC East title by beating the Commanders 29-18 on Saturday night.

item.title: Eagles go for 2, igniting brawl; Sirianni backs play
item.description: An on-field fight resulted in three players being ejected in Saturday's Eagles-Commanders game after Philadelphia, up by 17 late in the fourth quarter...

item.title: Lanning: Ducks fell short of 'standard' in CFP win
item.description: Dan Lanning expressed disappointment with how Oregon performed in the second half versus James Madison, despite advancing in the CFP for the first tim...

item.title: Short-handed Texas Tech jolts unbeaten Duke late
item.description: No. 19 Texas Tech, beset by injuries, rallied from 17 down to stun third-ranked Duke 82-81 at Madison Square Garden.
